Description: Book of the Dead of Ramose; fifteen fragments; black and red ink; full colour vignettes; coloured border.
Curator's comments: To be included in a study of BD spell 168 by Marcus Mueller (Bonn), and in a study of BD 168 by Daniel Mendes (Laguna).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (217)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134364) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134364)
